p: 5-Prolonged viremia is increasingly reported in ZIKV infection and had been related to pathogenesis [The Journal of Experimental Medicine (2019) 216 (10): 2302â€“2315]. Even if there is no way to know the duration of viremia in the cases with PCR positive presented in this work, do authors assume that the antecedent symptoms in the previous two months suggests prolonged viremia in cases with positive PCR?
